title: Unable to Gift Xayah/Rakan
body: When Gifting with the IP option, it returns "Your friend's gift pool is not large enough to recieve a mystery gift."

replies.body: Also "purchase.account.transactionInProgress" if you try again. Every single one of my friends is having this issue too.
Working now! :D all my mates and myself are able to gift. I will note that the gifts show up as 'undefined', but they do work.
Fix in the works! Sorry about that!
